Nashville-Davidson.University School of Nashville:
University School of Nashville is a private K-12 school located in Nashville, Tennessee.


== History ==
Referred to colloquially as USN, the school was founded in 1888 by the Peabody Board of Trustees. The school was first founded as Winthrop Model School; in 1915, it became Peabody Demonstration School (PDS), a part of Peabody College intended to demonstrate the operation of a school.
